attributes.background: Redundancy calculation is one week for every year of employment , up to max of 20 years.anyone over 40 years of age receives one and half weeks.I believe there should be no cut off at all, that everyone receives one week for each and every year worked.but still keep the rule for anyone over 40 , ie one and half weeks for every year .
